={{ JSON.stringify({ imageBase64: $json.imageDataUri ? $json.imageDataUri.replace(/^data:image\/[^;]+;base64,/, "") : null }) }}

={{ JSON.stringify({
  contents: [{
    parts: [{
      text: "Extract SPECIFIC STATISTICS from this football article. Look for:

1. MATCH SCORES (e.g., 3-0, 2-1)
2. POSSESSION PERCENTAGES
3. SHOT COUNTS
4. TRANSFER FEES (in millions)
5. LEAGUE STANDINGS/POINTS
6. GOAL SCORERS (without names, just counts)
7. ANY OTHER NUMERICAL DATA

ARTICLE CONTENT:
" + ($('Fetch Article Content').first().json.data || "No content").substring(0, 8000) + "

HEADLINE: " + $json.selectedTopic.headline + "

Return ONLY valid JSON:
{
  "score": "3-0" or null,
  "homeTeam": "Team A" or null,
  "awayTeam": "Team B" or null,
  "possession": { "home": 65, "away": 35 } or null,
  "shots": { "home": 15, "away": 8 } or null,
  "transferFee": "80M" or null,
  "leaguePosition": 1 or null,
  "points": 45 or null,
  "goalCount": 3 or null,
  "keyStatistic": "most important number/stat found",
  "dataRichness": 1-10 (how much real data found)
}"
    }]
  }]
}) }}
={{ JSON.stringify($json.requestBody) }}
